about_the_game:
Thank you for cooking with us through thick and thin!

This extravagant Cyber Pizzeria DLC was created to thank all Early Access players for supporting us through our most unstable times. We thought it was about time we made something extra awesome to add to your pizza-gaming experience on Steam.

This trippy set includes:
- Cyber Door (Animated)
- Pizza Crane Game (Animated)
- Virtual Pizza Boy (Animated)
- Illuminated Register (Animated)
- Gaming T.V. (Animated)
- Cyber Gear Case (Animated)
- Table Neon Controller (Animated)
- Pizza Wifi Neon (Animated)
- Gashapon Machine
- Cyber Pizzeria Wall
- Hexagon Tile
- Good Game Box
- Gaming Table Set
- Discount Poster
- UFO Pot

It has been an eye-opening experience coming on Steam to say the least. Learning what it truly means to develop a PC game, receiving helpful feedback on the core game and interacting with the community, we were able to better mature as a game and as a company. The current game and our team still has miles to go, but thank you for coming on the journey and supporting us!

Good Pizza, Great Pizza!

Thank you for cooking with us through thick and thin!

This extravagant Cyber Pizzeria DLC was created to thank all Early Access players for supporting us through our most unstable times. We thought it was about time we made something extra awesome to add to your pizza-gaming experience on Steam.

This trippy set includes:

It has been an eye-opening experience coming on Steam to say the least. Learning what it truly means to develop a PC game, receiving helpful feedback on the core game and interacting with the community, we were able to better mature as a game and as a company. The current game and our team still has miles to go, but thank you for coming on the journey and supporting us!

Good Pizza, Great Pizza!
